Employer Identification No.) &nbsp; 1 Infinite Loop Cupertino, California 95014 (Address of principal executive offices) (Zip Code) &nbsp; (408) 996-1010 (Registrant&#146;s telephone number, including area code) &nbsp; Not applicable (Former name or former address, if changed since last report.) &nbsp; Check the appropriate box below if the Form&nbsp;8-K filing is intended to simultaneously satisfy the filing obligation of the registrant under any of the following provisions: &nbsp; &#168; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Written communications pursuant to Rule&nbsp;425 under the Securities Act (17 CFR 230.425) &nbsp; &#168; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Soliciting material pursuant to Rule&nbsp;14a-12 under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.14a-12) &nbsp; &#168; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Pre-commencement communications pursuant to Rule&nbsp;14d-2(b)&nbsp;under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.14d-2(b)) &nbsp; &#168; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Pre-commencement communications pursuant to Rule&nbsp;13e-4(c)&nbsp;under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.13e-4(c)) &nbsp; &nbsp; Item 5.07 Submission of Matters to a Vote of Security Holders. &nbsp; The Annual Meeting of Shareholders (the &#147;Annual Meeting&#148;) of Apple Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;) was held on March&nbsp;10, 2015. At the Annual Meeting, the Company&#146;s shareholders voted on the following six proposals and cast their votes as described below. &nbsp; 1. The individuals listed below were elected at the Annual Meeting to serve as directors of the Company until the next annual meeting of shareholders and until their successors are duly elected and qualified: &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; For &nbsp; Against &nbsp; Abstained &nbsp; Broker&nbsp;Non-Vote Tim Cook &nbsp; 3,345,273,774 &nbsp; 19,035,736 &nbsp; 5,903,296 &nbsp; 1,502,570,664 Al Gore &nbsp; 3,261,713,739 &nbsp; 100,103,695 &nbsp; 8,395,372 &nbsp; 1,502,570,664 Bob Iger &nbsp; 3,348,183,764 &nbsp; 17,772,809 &nbsp; 4,256,233 &nbsp; 1,502,570,664 Andrea Jung &nbsp; 3,251,098,802 &nbsp; 114,242,399 &nbsp; 4,871,605 &nbsp; 1,502,570,664 Art Levinson &nbsp; 3,307,581,958 &nbsp; 54,730,768 &nbsp; 7,900,080 &nbsp; 1,502,570,664 Ron Sugar &nbsp; 3,333,351,056 &nbsp; 31,515,474 &nbsp; 5,346,276 &nbsp; 1,502,570,664 Sue Wagner &nbsp; 3,347,388,390 &nbsp; 17,857,090 &nbsp; 4,967,326 &nbsp; 1,502,570,664 &nbsp; 2. A management proposal to ratify the appointment of Ernst&nbsp;&amp; Young LLP as the Company&#146;s independent registered public accounting firm for 2015, as described in the proxy materials. This proposal was approved. &nbsp; For &nbsp; Against &nbsp; Abstained &nbsp; Broker&nbsp;Non-Vote 4,842,005,841 &nbsp; 18,891,324 &nbsp; 11,886,305 &nbsp; 0 &nbsp; 3. An advisory resolution to approve executive compensation, as described in the proxy materials. This proposal was approved. &nbsp; For &nbsp; Against &nbsp; Abstained &nbsp; Broker&nbsp;Non-Vote 2,485,393,490 &nbsp; 844,849,349 &nbsp; 39,969,967 &nbsp; 1,502,570,664 &nbsp; 4. A management proposal to amend the Company&#146;s Employee Stock Purchase Plan (the &#147;Purchase Plan&#148;) to increase by 50,000,000 the number of shares of the Company&#146;s common stock authorized for issuance under the Purchase Plan, as described in the proxy materials. This proposal was approved. &nbsp; For &nbsp; Against &nbsp; Abstained &nbsp; Broker&nbsp;Non-Vote 3,328,288,563 &nbsp; 32,006,980 &nbsp; 9,917,263 &nbsp; 1,502,570,664 &nbsp; A copy of the amended and restated Purchase Plan is filed as Exhibit&nbsp;10.1 hereto. &nbsp; 5. A shareholder proposal entitled &#147;Risk Report,&#148; as described in the proxy materials. This proposal was not approved. &nbsp; For &nbsp; Against &nbsp; Abstained &nbsp; Broker&nbsp;Non-Vote 47,781,336 &nbsp; 2,971,046,150 &nbsp; 351,385,320 &nbsp; 1,502,570,664 &nbsp; 6. A shareholder proposal entitled &#147;Proxy Access for Shareholders,&#148; as described in the proxy materials. This proposal was not approved. &nbsp; For &nbsp; Against &nbsp; Abstained &nbsp; Broker&nbsp;Non-Vote 1,314,981,629 &nbsp; 2,036,262,112 &nbsp; 18,969,065 &nbsp; 1,502,570,664 &nbsp; &nbsp; Item 9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. &nbsp; (d) Exhibits. &nbsp; Exhibit Number &nbsp; Exhibit&nbsp;Description &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 10.1 &nbsp; &nbsp; Employee Stock Purchase Plan, as amended and restated as of March&nbsp;10, 2015. &nbsp; SIGNATURE &nbsp; Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Apple Inc. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Date: March&nbsp;13, 2015 &nbsp; By: /s/ D.
